title: The Legend of the Condor Heroes - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama   Adapted to Manhua   Adapted to Movie   Betrayal   Classic   Devoted Love Interests   Male Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: Jin Yong   查良鏞
description:
The Legend of the Condor Heroes by Jin Yong was first serialized in newspapers from 1 January 1957 to 19 May 1959.

The book is the first of the Condor Trilogy. The story has undergone two revisions. The second edition was released in December 1975 and and the third edition was published in June 2002.>
